snippet.title: THQ Wireless - Saints Row 2 for mobile
snippet.description: The saga of the Third Street Saints continues with the highly anticipated multi-platform release of Saints Row 2! This also marks the return of the franchise to mobile, in an exciting open-world action game with multiple diverse missions, activities and mini-games seamlessly integrated into the game-play. Complete missions on foot or while driving, as you battle to regain territory from rival gangs and corrupt police.
